name: ArcDig
description:
A game about holes!

Dig around and look for Archeological Treasures! Careful not to get crushed!

(It is very incomplete, controls listed below)

Controls:

 Game-pad recommended

Game-pad

Keyboard

Movement

Left stick

a, d & w keys

Tile Selection

Right stick

Arrow keys

Dig Tile

Triggers or bumpers

Space

 Team:

 Design & Art - Suraj Sirohi https://www.instagram.com/surajsirohi1008/

   +1 line of code

Design & Programming - Gabriel Holtschlag

   +Player hat
